tech-realism.name: Tech Realism
tech-realism.description: AI progress is real but hype is overblown. Intelligence requires embodiment, not just scale.

institutional-decay.name: Institutional Decay
institutional-decay.description: American political institutions are under structural stress. Constitutional mechanisms becoming routine partisan tools.

narrative-power.name: Narrative Power
narrative-power.description: Cultural narratives and media framing shape technology adoption as much as technical capabilities.

cultural-futures.name: Cultural Futures
cultural-futures.description: Long-term bets on civilizational trajectory, human progress, and existential questions.
